Package org.openscience.cdk.interfaces

Interface IChemFile

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable, ICDKObject, IChemObject
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChemFile, ChemFile, DebugChemFile
    public interface IChemFile
extends IChemObject
    An IChemObject containing a number of ChemSequences. This is supposed to be the top level container, which can contain all the concepts stored in a chemical document
    Author:
    egonw
    Source code:
    main
    Belongs to CDK module:
    interfaces
